name: Squad Battles
description: I believe that this game could be in the top ranks one day like CSGO or COD and all those amazing games and im commited to doing this. This game is for entertainment i always loved to entertain people i have a youtube channel called Wizard Productions Gaming i do some videos on there about 3 or 4 times a week i try as much as i can and im dedicated to it, i dont come from a rich family or anything like that but they have given me everything that i've got and i want to give back to the people that gave me these things, and im hoping to do that with this game im hoping to give back to my family, i want to give to the people of the internet that aren't always on my side but still are amazing people, i wanna give to everyone on this planet and i plan on doing that with this game and all my other projects like my youtube channel, and im proud to announce that this game is finally gonna be in beta as of November 18, 2015. I hope you guys check it out cause its gonna be a great day!
